skill_constraints: Single frontend developer creates a critical bottleneck, especially in Sprint 2.
resource_bottlenecks: frontend.dev1@company.com in Sprint 2; backend.dev2@company.com in Sprint 5.
mitigation_strategies: Shift non-critical tasks out of overloaded sprints. High risk of delay.
